Article.Title: May Pendant Shade, Neon Blue
Article.Description: Inspired by fashion runways, these shades are designed to stand out. The neon accents lets you show off your style, just turn them on and strike a pose.

Article.Title: May Pendant Shade, Neon Orange
Article.Description: If you already have pendant lighting set up in your home then you’re good to go. There’s no need to call an electrician, these shades can be fitted quickly and easily.

Article.Title: May Pendant Shade, Neon Pink
Article.Description: Looking to brighten up a room? Try hanging a series above your dining table, give your living space an arty appeal or add a touch of fun in a classic white bedroom.

Article.Title: Hue Pendant Shade, Grey & Copper
Article.Description: It’s doesn’t matter if it’s day or night, Hue looks super sleek on or off. The shade is made with cotton in a soft grey or deep navy. The reflective copper liner throws the light further and gives any room or hallway a warm glow.

Article.Title: Broadway Star Table Lamp, Black
Article.Description: Get some classic New York glamour with the Broadway. We dare you to try and find lighting with more statement.

Article.Title: Broadway Arrow Table Lamp, Black
Article.Description: Table or wall? It's your choice - with handy wall fittings and a cable mounted switch, you can set it up exactly as you like.

Article.Title: Broadway Arrow Table Lamp, Black
Article.Description: Bring some vintage Hollywood glamour into your home with this tripod floor lamp. Inspired by film sets from days gone by.

Article.Title: Navy Tripod Floor Lamp, Black
Article.Description: This lamp adds a contemporary, nautical edge to your look. Made with a seafaring tripod structure and chrome metal detailing.

Article.Title: Alfred Tripod Floor Lamp, White
Article.Description: A statement piece with an iconic tripod shape and sleek, shuttered shade. Inspired by studio lights from Hollywood's golden era

Article.Title: Cohen Double Floor Lamp, White and Natural Oak
Article.Description: A true statement piece, the doubled headed industrial design is softened by the offset of natural wood and bold single colours.

Article.Title: Cohen Table Lamp, Memphis Blue and Natural Oak
Article.Description: This table lamp is all about the smart detailing, the shade top and handle are both finished in American Oak. It's fun and modern and would be an ideal addition to a loft apartment or city pad.

Article.Title: Lab Table Lamp, Teal, Deep Grey and Mustard
Article.Description: Designed to steal the show and be the focal point of the room. Each piece of glass is mouth blown and hand moulded. Every curve and air bubble seen through the glass are marks of a handmade piece.

Article.Title: Austin Cluster Pendant, Copper
Article.Description: The shape of the shades is inspired by space-age interiors of the 60s. The spiral of globe shades creates concentrated pools of light while the decorative air vents at the top of the piece diffuse the glow for an ambient uplight.

Article.Title: Austin Spot Wall Light, Copper
Article.Description: Classic, chic, modern, industrial. The copper trend is one of the most versatile and fun to play around with. These wall lights are the ideal addition to any stylish home.

Article.Title: Cage Pendant, Black
Article.Description: Add a unique and stylish touch to your home with this lantern-shaped pendant light - a modern addition to any living space.

Article.Title: Hive Pendant Light, Soft Green
Article.Description: This geometric pendant light will bring a modern edge to any living space.

Article.Title: Freddie Pendant Shade, Black
Article.Description: Like its namesake, the Freddie shade commands attention. Designed with bold, geometric patterns, it softly illuminates bedrooms and living spaces.

Article.Title: Verdon Cushion 45 x 45cm, Teal and Yellow Mix
Article.Description: Make a statement by mixing and matching these awesome graphics. Feeling brave? This cushion is part of our Memphis look. Explore these designs and see how bold you can go.

Article.Title: Verdon Cushion 45 x 45cm, Grey and Yellow Mix
Article.Description: Full of energy and attitude, Verdon is an eclectic mix of bold colours and big shapes. A fun throwback to the 80s sure to give your room a stylish lift.

Article.Title: Verdon Cushion 45 x 45cm, Green and Blue Mix
Article.Description: We hit up our designer friends, Casa Estudio, for these cushions. Famous for their use of geometric patterns and colour clashes, Verdon gives your home instant designer cred.

Article.Title: Verdon Cushion 45 x 45cm, Green and Yellow Mix
Article.Description: Each totally rad design has been digitally printed onto 100% cotton fabric. The inside is then filled with a luxury feather pad. These guys love a good hug, too.

Article.Title: Verdon Cushion 45 x 45cm, Red
Article.Description: Full of energy and attitude, Verdon is an eclectic mix of bold colours and big shapes. A fun throwback to the 80s sure to give your room a stylish lift.

Article.Title: Verdon Cushion 45 x 45cm, Yellow
Article.Description: We hit up our designer friends, Casa Estudio, for these cushions. Famous for their use of geometric patterns and colour clashes, Verdon gives your home instant designer cred.

Article.Title: Script Printed Ribs Cushion 43 x 43cm, Grey
Article.Description: Designed inhouse by the MADE.COM team and digitally printed by a family-run business, our Script cushions are keeping things British.

Article.Title: Mya Cotton Velvet Cushion 50cm x 50cm, Plum with Purple Piping
Article.Description: You could get lost looking into the bold purple of this Mya cushion. In a cotton velvet fabric, the colour is rich right down to the contrast piping.

Article.Title: Mya Cotton Velvet Cushion 50cm x 50cm, Purple with Plum Piping
Article.Description: The country is known for its premium cotton manufacturing, so of course we chose to have the fabric for these cushions woven in the cotton mills of Portugal.

Article.Title: Mya Cotton Velvet Cushion 50cm x 50cm, Teal with Purple Piping
Article.Description: Mya is available in three colours, so you can mix and match the set with other cushions. They look beautiful against purples, teals and deep neutral tones.

Article.Title: Novello Scatter Cushion 50 x 50cm, Purple and Gold
Article.Description: Inspired by the vibrant tones of jewels and precious gems, the Novello collection adds a certain air of opulence to your living space.

Article.Title: Talen Cushion 45 x 45cm, Blue
Article.Description: No need to hunt for authentic patterns to suit your decor. The Talen cushion will give your living space the eclectic detail it's been missing.

Article.Title: Porthole Cushion 40 x 40cm, Yellow
Article.Description: This range was created especially for us by Fashion Designer Philip Colbert. Like the pieces on his own label, it blends pop-art, fashion and culture.

Article.Title: Scale Cushion 40 x 40cm, Black and White
Article.Description: Why not add some eye-catching pattern to your home with Colbert's Scale cushion. It makes a lively focal piece for living rooms, bedrooms and play rooms.

Article.Title: Fish Cushion 40 x 40cm, Red
Article.Description: This animated cushion really comes to life with the rest of the collection. Each piece has a fun, nautical design to liven up your home.

Article.Title: Decker Large Square Cushion 50 x 50cm, Bus Print
Article.Description: Kids will love this. Clad in a bespoke woven fabric with an iconic British silhouette - rows of colourful double decker buses. Made in the UK.

Article.Title: Jack Large Scatter Cushion 50 x 50cm, Union Jack Pink
Article.Description: Fly the flag for British design with this bespoke Union Jack cushion. With distressed fabric and a modern colourway for a fun twist

Article.Title: Jack Large Scatter Cushion 50 x 50cm, Union Jack Charcoal
Article.Description: Use it on its own to add homegrown design and texture to your look. Or pair it with other pieces in the Britannia Collection for impact.

Article.Title: Holst Broken Lines Printed Pouffe, Indigo
Article.Description: There are no rules. Our Holst collection can be used as a seat, footstool or add a tray and it becomes a coffee table. It gives your home a cool and casual feel.

Article.Title: Holst Broken Lines Printed Pouffe, Tonal Grey
Article.Description: Holst comes in two prints and two colours. Inspired by abstract patterns, choose from a mash-up of edgy lines or a mix of shadowy squares. Looks fab in pairs or on their own.

Article.Title: Dipped 35 x 60cm Cushion, Delft Blue
Article.Description: Bring a blush of bright colour with our exclusive Dipped cushions. Designed to add a decorative touch to your bed, and prop you up ready for breakfast in bed.

Article.Title: Loop Rug 160 x 230cm, Grey and Peppermint Mix
Article.Description: Made by artisans in India, each shape is hand carved to enhance its geometric design. Not just an ordinary rug, it’s a masterpiece.

Article.Title: Loop Rug 160 x 230cm, Monochrome Mix
Article.Description: Classic monochrome, tonal pastels and retro colours make the Loop collection an easy fit for both the upstairs or downstairs areas of your home.

Article.Title: Hex Spot Rug 170 x 240cm, Coal Grey
Article.Description: Inspired by an age old style, these lightweight rugs are used all over the world. With contemporary geometric designs.

Article.Title: Marcell Sideboard, Grey
Article.Description: No need to break the bank on stylish storage solutions. The Marcell sideboard looks like it cost a small fortune - we won't tell if you don't.

Article.Title: Marcell Media Unit, Grey
Article.Description: No need to break the bank on stylish storage solutions. The Marcell Media Unit looks like it cost a small fortune - we won't tell if you don't.

Article.Title: Marcell Compact Sideboard, Grey
Article.Description: No need to break the bank on stylish storage solutions. The Marcell sideboard looks like it cost a small fortune - we won't tell if you don't.

Article.Title: Henge Large Storage Unit, Oak and White
Article.Description: The details stand out - from the striking contrast between the sleek white lacquer and wood, to the beautiful sleigh feet in solid oak.

Article.Title: Henge Large Storage Unit, Walnut and Red
Article.Description: The details stand out - from the striking contrast between the red lacquer and wood, to the beautiful sleigh feet in solid walnut.

Article.Title: Aveiro Cabinet, Oak
Article.Description: If you like a bit of Scandi with your storage, then you’ve come to the right place. Aveiro is a sophisticated piece with clean lines and a sleek, minimal look.

Article.Title: Marcell Media Unit, White
Article.Description: No need to break the bank on stylish storage solutions. The Marcell Media Unit looks like it cost a small fortune - we won't tell if you don't.

Article.Title: Marcell Sideboard, White
Article.Description: No need to break the bank on stylish storage solutions. The Marcell sideboard looks like it cost a small fortune - we won't tell if you don't.

Article.Title: Bourbon Vintage Wardrobe, Distressed Grey
Article.Description: This wardrobe adds a hint of vintage style. Inspired by French neoclassical lines and brought up-to-date with a contemporary distressed finish.

Article.Title: Belvoir Wardrobe, Natural Ash
Article.Description: Combining the ornate curves of classic French design with the raw beauty of natural ash, for a pared-down take on a traditional style.

Article.Title: Ledger Wardrobe, Dark Stain Elm
Article.Description: An ideal match to the Ledger double bed. Pair with other collection pieces like the chest of drawers for a complete, contemporary look.

Article.Title: Ledger Wardrobe, Oak
Article.Description: An ideal match to the Ledger double bed. Pair with other collection pieces like the chest of drawers for a complete, contemporary look.

Article.Title: 2 x Flynn Dining Chairs, Persian Grey
Article.Description: Add understated elegance to your dining room with this pair of chairs. With simple, sleek lines for an effortless, pared down look.

Article.Title: 2 x Jersey Dining Chairs, Graphite Grey
Article.Description: Inspired by the iconic fifties diner look and given a modern update, keeping the design intact without it feeling dated.

Article.Title: 2 x Hoxton Dining Chairs, Pistachio Green
Article.Description: East meets West and traditional meets modern in the Hoxton's low, Oriental-style back and updated take on heritage buttoning.

Article.Title: 2 x Wilton Dining Chairs, Graphite Grey
Article.Description: Striking and sophisticated - with sleek, structured lines and a low back. In a range of understated colours.

Article.Title: Percy Scoop Back Chair, Putty Beige
Article.Description: With its clean contours and subtle details, this chair will add a retro feel to any design-led dining room. In a neutral putty beige.

Article.Title: Percy Scoop Back Chair, Pewter Grey
Article.Description: The scoop back shape gives this chair a smooth, streamlined silhouette and comfy, supportive sit. Finished with contrast stain legs.

Article.Title: 2 x Flynn Dining Chairs, Biscuit Beige
Article.Description: Add understated elegance to your dining room with this pair of chairs. With simple, sleek lines for an effortless, pared-down look.

Article.Title: 2 x Jacob Dining Chairs Alabaster and Ash
Article.Description: This pair of dining chairs are inspired by mid-century Scandinavian design - so Jacob is pronounced with a Y instead of J.

Article.Title: 2 x Dolly Dining Chairs, Walnut and Black
Article.Description: Pencil in a power lunch, or a pow-wow. The Dolly chairs add a mark of sophistication to dining rooms, board rooms or meeting rooms.
